title: BRIEF-Suzano says cash flow to shareholders will rise 44 pct after Fibria deal
text: March 16, 2018 / 6:16 PM / Updated 16 minutes ago BRIEF-Suzano says cash flow to shareholders will rise 44 pct after Fibria deal Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - Suzano Papel E Celulose Sa: * SUZANO CEO SAYS TRANSACTION WITH FIBRIA WILL BRING $9.2 BILLION TO BRAZIL * SUZANO CEO SAYS BOTH COMPANIES WILL HAVE 6.4 BILLION REAIS IN CAPITAL SPENDING THIS YEAR * SUZANO CEO SAYS COMBINATION WITH FIBRIA CREATES CO HIGHLY COMPETITIVE * SUZANO CFO SAYS CO AFTER MERGER WILL FOCUS ON REDUCING DEBT LEVELS FAST * SUZANO CFO SAYS DELEVERAGING WILL NOT DEPEND ON SINERGIES * SUZANO PRESENTATION SAYS NEW COMPANY CASH FLOW TO SHAREHOLDERS WILL BE 44 PERCENT HIGHER * BNDES CEO PAULO RABELLO DE CASTRO SAYS FIBRIA-SUZANO TIE UP CREATES NOT A NATIONAL CHAMPION, BUT A WORLD PULP GIANT * BNDES CEO PAULO RABELLO DE CASTRO SAYS THE ONLY CRITERIA FOR ANALYZING SUZANO DEAL WAS POTENTIAL OF VALUE CREATION * SUZANO SAYS NEW COMPANY AIMS TO REACH LEVERAGE OF 3.5 EBITDA BY YEAR-END Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting by Tatiana Bautzer)
